materials.raw_text:
Bismuth (Bi): 20 g 
 Indium (In): 40 g 
 Lead (Pb): 100 g 
 Zirconium (Zr): 50 g 
 Flux (optional, e.g., Borax): 5 g

sourcing.instructions:
Bismuth: Available from chemical supply stores or online suppliers (e.g., Sigma-Aldrich). 
 Indium: Obtain from metal suppliers or online platforms (e.g., Amazon, eBay). 
 Lead: Purchase from hardware stores or specialized metal suppliers. 
 Zirconium: Sourced from chemical suppliers or online marketplaces. 
 Flux (Borax): Available in craft stores or online.
